namuth ape awadhanaya yomu nowuna pathi thibenawa. 2009 mayi dahanawa (19) wanida shri lankawe parajayata pathwu koti ada mehi nathi wuwata widesha ratawal wala ha me ratin panagath kotin ha amerikanu dolarwalata kadara wu samahara rajya nowana sanwidhanawala kihipa denekuth thaman dana ho nodana katayuthu karana atham kandayamakuth me ratata wishala jathyanthara balapamak athikaragena yanawa.ee jathyanthara balapam woshintan nuwarin niwyork nagarayen jiniwa nuwarin pamanak nowa dan dan me rata thulinuth athi kirimata balaporoththu wenawa.
